::SnowCat::

She fell to the ground after Striker threw her off.  She lay there, 
gasping for breath.  Most of her body was covered in mech fluid. She 
looked up with her eyes and saw Andromeda.  She gave a small 
smile.  "We got them, we hit them hard huh? we got them. They fled 
like the cowards they were huh?"  She coughed and choked."Did we get 
our bots back? We got Spears back and Striker yes? yesss."  She 
closed her eyes."Thank the Matrix we got our friends back. That's 
what we fought for, friends."  She closed her eyes and 
whispered. "Till all are one."
Her body then lay still and the light in her optics faded.  Her spark 
stopped beating in her chest and joined the matrix.


Please put SnowCat on the deceased list.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Andromeda:::
> 
> Andromeda: Sure, ill help, if you help with Bluestreak
> ::She looks at SnowCat::
> Andromeda: i think she needs help too.
